pageContext.claim: “Lou, they put on stories and CNN, and on NBC, and CBS, and ABC, and NBC being an offshoot also with the MSNBC, which is ridiculous.  They put on stories that are so false.  They have so-called sources that, in my opinion, don’t exist.  You know, they’ll say, “Sources have said,” they don’t know. They’re sitting down, they just -- they make it up.  It is so dishonest.  It is so fake.”
pageContext.analysis: Mainstream news organizations do not routinely invent news reports -- and it is grounds for firing. Trump equates "fake news" to news that he considered negative.
